name: Digital Adventssljusstake
description:
Celebrate Lucia, now digitally!

This is a sort of diorama interactive point and click playtoy.
Made over the course of a weekend, as a sort of personal game jam
This game remembers your progress between sessions, so you can keep your candle progress from week to week.

Controls:

Click everything!
Click and drag the matchbox to light the match.
Several things can be lit on fire, so be careful!

Note: Linux and Mac versions are untested as of yet! Please contact me if they don't work!
